# AVDisplayManagerModeSwitchStart

**Type Property**

A notification the display manager posts when a display begins a mode switch.

## Declaration

```swift
static let AVDisplayManagerModeSwitchStart: NSNotification.Name
```

## AVKit

- **AVDisplayManagerModeSwitchSettingsChanged**: A notification the display manager posts when a user changes their Match Content settings in the tvOS Settings app.
- **AVDisplayManagerModeSwitchEnd**: A notification the display manager posts when a display ends a mode switch.
